## FormComponent interface

Represents a form component. Implemented by [DynamicForm](./dynamic-forms.dynamicform.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface FormComponent<TConfig, TForm, TFormState, TResult> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [config](./dynamic-forms.formcomponent.config.md) | Immutable&lt;Maybe&lt;TConfig&gt;&gt; | The form configuration object |
|  [formSubmitted](./dynamic-forms.formcomponent.formsubmitted.md) | EventEmitter&lt;Maybe&lt;TResult&gt;&gt; | An event emitter that emits the form value when the user submits the form |
|  [initialValue](./dynamic-forms.formcomponent.initialvalue.md) | Immutable&lt;DeepPartial&lt;TForm&gt;&gt; | The initial value of the form |
|  [inputState](./dynamic-forms.formcomponent.inputstate.md) | Maybe&lt;Immutable&lt;TFormState&gt;&gt; | The form state shared by the controls of the form |
